ValidationRule.description: Requires Project_Management_Note__c when Quote_Stage__c is set to “4 Need Adtl Info”
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL( Quote_Stage__c , "4 Need Adtl Info"), ISBLANK(Project_Management_Note__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please provide information on what information is need in Notes from Project Management.
